fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You can trick someone, Taunting them into attacking you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you have Taunted attacks you, you will counter-attack them with a Powerful Attack.
- Witch is immune to Taunt.
- You cannot counter-attack Astral attacks.
- Taunting a Necromancer will force their ghoul to attack you.
- While taunting you will appear Suspicious to a Sheriff.
